solution_line_template: Before purchasing the beanie, Sarah has ${money_remaining_after_beanie} + ${cost_beanie} = $<<{money_remaining_after_beanie}+{cost_beanie}={money_before_beanie}>>{money_before_beanie}
Before purchasing the scarf, Sarah has ${money_before_beanie} + ${cost_scarf} = $<<{money_before_beanie}+{cost_scarf}={money_before_scarf}>>{money_before_scarf}
The total cost of the toy cars is {num_toy_cars} * ${cost_per_toy_car} = $<<{num_toy_cars}*{cost_per_toy_car}={total_cost_toy_cars}>>{total_cost_toy_cars}
Before purchasing the toy cars, Sarah has ${money_before_scarf} + ${total_cost_toy_cars} = $<<{money_before_scarf}+{total_cost_toy_cars}={initial_money}>>{initial_money}
